title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Beat the eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in the egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill or fry the chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions, add tomatoes, and simmer.
Add chicken and cream, cook for 10 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with mixed vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies with a golden-brown edge.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Combine dry ingredients and gradually add to wet mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
